content: You are an expert in program verification.

You are translating an idea for a Dafny program into a specification, consisting of datatypes, function signatures (without body) and lemmas (using the {:axiom} annotation and without body). Here is the idea:
$IDEA

Please output the specification without using an explicit module, starting with a line "// BEGIN DAFNY", ending with a line "// END DAFNY".
